languages.text: {n}Священник безумно улыбается, раскинув руки и выпятив грудь.{/n} "Так не мешкай же, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Яви мне милость Императора, раз считаешь себя достойн{mf|ым|ой} вершить суд Его. Надеюсь, твоя рука не дрогнет под тяжестью злодеяний, свершенных ею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник безумно улыбается, раскинув руки и выпятив грудь.{/n} "Так не мешкай же, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Яви мне милость Императора, раз считаешь себя достойн{mf|ым|ой} вершить суд Его. Надеюсь, твоя рука не дрогнет под тяжестью пороков, свершенных ею".

languages.text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."
languages.original_text: {n}Священник безумно улыбается, раскинув руки и выпятив грудь.{/n} "Так не мешкай же, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Яви мне милость Императора, раз считаешь себя достойн{mf|ым|ой} вершить суд Его. Надеюсь, твоя рука не дрогнет под тяжестью злодеяний, свершенных ею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry, my {mf|son|daughter}! Deliver the Emperor's Grace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

{n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

{n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

languages.text: {n}狂ったような笑みを浮かべ、ヒエロニムスは腕を広げて胸を突き出す。{/n}「ならば立ち止まらぬことです！ご自身があの方の裁きを免れるにふさわしいと考えるなら、私に皇帝陛下の安らぎをもたらされよ。その手が犯した悪事の重さで震えることがなければいいのですが」
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}狂ったような笑みを浮かべ、ヒエロニムスは腕を広げて胸を突き出す。{/n}「ならば立ち止まらぬことです！ご自身があの方の裁きを免れるにふさわしいと考えるなら、私に皇帝陛下の安らぎをもたらされよ。その手が犯した悪事の重さで震えることがなければいいのですが」

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire dément, Hiéronymus étend les bras et gonfle sa poitrine.{/n} « Alors, faites vite ! Accordez-moi la paix de l'Empereur, si vous vous pensez digne de rendre Son jugement. Puisse votre main ne pas trembler sous le poids de tous les méfaits qu'elle a commis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire dément, Hiéronymus étend les bras et gonfle sa poitrine.{/n} « Alors faites vite, {mf|mon fils|ma fille} ! Accordez-moi la paix de l'Empereur, si vous vous pensez digne de rendre Son jugement. Puisse votre main ne pas trembler sous le poids de tous les méfaits qu'elle a commis. »

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯露出了疯狂的微笑，张开双臂，挺起胸膛。{/n}“那就一刻都不要耽搁了！如果你以为你有资格以帝皇的名义审判我，那就赐予我祂的安宁吧。但愿你的双手不会由于即将犯下的恶行而颤抖不已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯露出了疯狂的微笑，张开双臂，挺起胸膛。{/n}“那就一刻都不要耽搁了，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}！如果你以为你有资格以帝皇的名义审判我，那就赐予我祂的安宁吧。但愿你的双手不会由于即将犯下的恶行而颤抖不已。”

languages.text: {n}Mit einem irren Lächeln breitet Hieronymus seine Arme aus und streckt seine Brust nach vorne.{/n} "Dann zaudert nicht! Bringt mir den Frieden des Imperators, wenn Ihr Euch für würdig erachtet, Sein Urteil zu vollstrecken. Möge Eure Hand nicht zittern unter der Last aller Missetaten, die sie vollzogen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem irren Lächeln breitet Hieronymus seine Arme aus und streckt seine Brust nach vorne.{/n} "Dann zögert nicht, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}! Bringt mir den Frieden des Imperators, wenn Ihr Euch für würdig erachtet, Sein Urteil zu vollstrecken. Möge Eure Hand nicht zittern unter der Last aller Missetaten, die sie vollzogen hat."

languages.text: {n}Mostrando una sonrisa desquiciada, extiende sus brazos ampliamente y eleva su pecho.{/n} «¡Pues sea rápid{mf|o|a}! Bríndeme la Paz del Emperador si se considera dign{mf|o|a} de impartir su justicia. Que su mano no tiemble con el peso de todas las maldades que ha causado».
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mostrando una sonrisa desquiciada, extiende sus brazos ampliamente y eleva su pecho.{/n} «¡Pues sea rápid{mf|o|a}, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}! Bríndeme la Paz del Emperador si se considera dign{mf|o|a} de impartir su justicia. Que su mano no tiemble con el peso de todas las maldades que ha causado».

languages.text: {n}Delice gülen Hieronymus, kollarını ardına kadar açıp göğsüne vuruyor.{/n} "Hiç durma! Kendini O'nun adaletini sağlamaya layık görüyorsan İmparator'un Huzuru'na eriştir beni. Elin, işlediği suçların ağırlığının altında titremesin."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling madly, Hieronymus spreads his arms wide and thrusts out his chest.{/n} "Then do not tarry! Deliver the Emperor's Peace unto me, if you think yourself worthy of passing His judgement. May your hand not waver under the weight of all the malefactions it has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Delice gülen Hieronymus kollarını ardına kadar açıyor ve göğsüne vuruyor.{/n} "O hâlde hiç durma! Eğer kendini O'nun adaletini sağlamaya layık görüyorsan İmparator'un Huzuru'na erişmemi sağla. Elin işlediği suçların ağırlığının altında titremesin."
